description:
The rampaging ancient weapon: the mobile fortress, Destroyer, is headed straight for Kazuma and party`s city!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Final Flame for This Over-the-Top Fortress!
Kono Rifujin na Yousai ni Shuuen o!
Une dernière flamme pour cette forteresse abusée !
この理不尽な要塞に終焔を!
讓蠻橫的要塞燃起終焰！
